title: Can I rotate the lock screen when in the Pixel stand?
content: I have a new Pixel 3XL and Pixel Stand.  Wireless charging works great whether I am charging in portrait or landscape mode. My only complaint is that when charging in landscape mode I would like the lock screen (ambient display) to rotate to landscape.  Is there a way to do this?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3 XL
